verbs.description: [V: swirled] [ARG1: raspberry chocolate cheesecake] one secret to a lighter fluffier cheesecake use the foaming power of eggs when you beat egg whites to stiff peaks and gently fold them into the cream cheese mixture the eggs add more volume and lightness because of trapped air this light fluffy cheesecake is a family favorite —brittney segobiano geneseo illinois onemain financial services food news rda enthusiast brands brittney segobiano geneseo grand canyon s digest cheesecake —brittney segobiano geneseo illinois magazine customer service chocolate editor partner illinois america
